name: DEMONBOX
description:
We all have our Demons, DEMONBOX is the first service to put them in a box.

Put your demons in a box and stop worrying about them!

IMPORTANT: If the demons start taking too much space, feel free to simply shoosh them using your mouse.

If you ever have dark thoughts, we advise you to use them to feed your demons by using the right click of your mouse. It often calms them.

This game was inspired by a comic from tumblr user phantomqueen.

I made it in one day so it's a very small thing.

ONLY THE WINDOWS VERSION IS WINDOWLESS / ALWAYS ON TOP
